contact_area.description: Area over which the force is applied.

object_mass.description: Mass of the object applying the force.

surface_type.description: Type of surface on which force is applied.

deformation.description: Initial surface deformation due to applied force.

material_hardness.description: Hardness level of the contact material.

pressure_distribution.description: Distribution pattern of pressure across the surface.

duration.description: Duration for which the force is applied.

contact_shape.description: Shape of the contact area affecting pressure concentration.

surface_roughness.description: Roughness of the surface affecting pressure distribution.

force_application_angle.description: Angle at which force is applied relative to the surface normal.
